All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Assortment<W extends Wine>
The Assortment class represents a collection of Wine objects.
BottleSize
This `BottleSize` enum represents the possible bottle sizes of the wine.
Color
This `Color` enum represents the possible colors of the wine.
InvalidBottleVolumeException
Exception thrown if the set bottle size volume does not match any in the BottleSize enum.
InvalidYearException
Exception thrown when the year provided for a wine is not valid.
Launcher
The Launcher class serves as the entry point to the WineStock JavaFX application.
PostgreSQLManager
A class that manages PostgreSQL database operations for wines and assortments.
Wine
This class represents a specific type of wine which encapsulates various attributes of the wine such as its name, production year, bottle size, color, price, and user comments.
Wine.Builder
The Builder class is responsible for building instances of the Wine class.
WineAlreadyInAssortmentException
Exception thrown if a wine is already included in an assortment and an attempt is made to add it again.
WineNotInAssortmentException
Exception thrown if an attempt is made to remove a wine from an assortment, but the wine is not in the assortment.
WineStock
The WineStock class is the entry point of the application.
WineStockController
WineStockController class controls the Wine Stock application's UI.
